column1: NASA/POWER CERES/MERRA2 Native Resolution Monthly and Annual
Elevation from MERRA-2: Average for 0.5 x 0.625 degree lat/lon region = 3516.05 meters
The value for missing source data that cannot be computed or is outside of the sources availability range: -999
